oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1946-12-20 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on December 20, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Mary Lou; Cimarron Kids; Hiram Higsby; Little Willie; Dick Reinhart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening theme and statements / (0:26) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Tuck Me To Sleep In My Old Kentucky Home" / (1:45) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (2:11) Mary Lou performs "I Hate To Say Goodbye To The Prairie" / (3:53) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (4:00) The Cimarron Kids perform "Heartbreak Trail" / (6:16) Hiram Higsby tells the programs credits / (6:37) Hiram Higsby performs "The Little Shirt My Mother Made For Me" / (8:17) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (8:37) Little Willie [phonetic] performs "[Unidentified instrumental]" / (10:17) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (10:30) Dick Reinhart performs "On The Banks Of The Sunny San Juan" / (13:21) Allan Page introduces the next song / (13:29) Hiram Higsby performs "[Unidentified instrumental]" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: KOMA recording service document [handwritten] stored with transcription documents; Box 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick;
